Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui

Class GUIHelper

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.GUIHelper
public class GUIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
Singleton class containing GUI-specific methods and variables. Its main use is to store variables that many JavaFX controllers need to access and to execute big redundant GUI methods

      public static void fillMarket​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid)
      Populates the market by reading values from the GameView singleton
      Parameters:

    • fillDevGrid

      public static void fillDevGrid​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid)
      Fills the development market getting the card composition from the DevelopmentMarketView. The order of levels is reversed, as shown in the rules of the game
      Parameters:
      grid - the GridPane of the development market

    • updateDevGrid

      public void updateDevGrid​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid)
      This method fills the development card market and makes the card selectable and interactive. The order of levels is reversed, as shown in the rules of the game
      Parameters:
      grid - the GridPane of the development market

    • buildNickList

      public void buildNickList​(java.util.List<User> users)
      Creates the player's nickname list and saves the index in the play order of the client. Also creates another list containing all the nicknames of the players who are not the client
      Parameters:
      users - list of the users in the game

    • restoreNickList

      public void restoreNickList​(java.util.List<PlayerView> players)
      Creates the player's nickname list and saves the index in the play order of the client. Also creates another list containing all the nicknames of the players who are not the client
      Parameters:
      players - list of the PlayerViews of the players in the game

      Parameters:

      Places a certain image view on the faith track
      Parameters:
      faith - the faith value
      faithGrid - the GridPane of the faith track

    • getDevVisualizer

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getDevVisualizer()
      Returns:
      the ImageView of the devVisualizer, a Node that shows the current hovered development card

    • activeSpecialDepot

      public boolean activeSpecialDepot​(PlayerView player, int index)
      This method checks if a certain leader card has the extra depot ability and if it's active
      Parameters:
      player - the player who possesses the leader card that must be checked
      index - the index of the checked card
      Returns:
      true if the leader card has the ExtraDepotAbility and is active, false otherwise

    • abilityCorresponds

      public boolean abilityCorresponds​(DepotView depot, LeaderCard card)
      This method checks if a certain depot is the one associated with a ExtraDepotAbility leader card
      Parameters:
      depot - the depot to check
      card - the leader card
      Returns:
      true if it's the associated depot, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      stage - the stage of the scene

      public Resource[] discountPrice​(Resource[] price)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the discounted price
